name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
review title: This phone look fantastic both gold and black
content:
I write this review after using 1 month of purchase
1.about camera-both front and rear especially rear if you taking pictures outdoor.picture is very sharp and fantastic
There is no complain about camera.
Indoor front camera performance is good.Rear is Perfecto.
2.about performance-I like to play game and bought this because gaming.there is no lag playing on subsurf and no lag even in asphalt8.I used to play most of time ashphalt8 and Sometimes there is a little bit lay down during processing the game and I think it's common issue in every high RAM phones even you you have 4GB+RAM.
3.Battery-This device battery is good you can use all day long 24hours.
4.Issue-issue is if looking for glass guard and back cover for this device forget it.it is very frustrating that you have cool device and the protection utility is not available in market.but likely J7max back cover fits in it.so you can take a breath.
5.there is real cons is It has no Gorilla Glass protection.
I hope you Guys like my review.plz press like icon READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:

Pros -
1. Camera quality is amazing, best compared to other phones in this price.
2. Performance is amazing, applications run like a beast.
3. Screen size is perfect not very big, I was worried at the time of order but its ok.
4. Full hd videos..
5. Different modes available to manage your battery life.
Cons:
1. Battery is 3300 mah only, only a day not more than that.
2. Normal charging, no fast charging option.
3. Only 32 gb inbuilt memory, 64 gb option should also be provided. READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
The phone overall is good..following are its pros ans cons after using it for 15 days
PROS
-good boot up tym
-Fast fingerprint sensor
-Battery can last upto 26 hrs on MID power saving mode and 22 hrs on normal mode
-camera gives good quality pics in natural and ambient lighting
-gaming performance is good....i was able to play NOVA , Modern combat 5, asphalt xtreme without any glitch
-ya diaplay is not as good as compared to A5 2016 i.e its not sAMOLED but tft dislplay saves battery consumption.
-big and sharp screen
-has lots of security features, pay mini, antivirus, protection by samsung knox
-stunning outer body and nice curves....
-good build quality and feels premium
-selfie camera with flash
CONS
-Display is not visible in sunlight and one has to cover the screen
-wi fi is itself on adaptive mode so it will disconnect any tym and one has to connect it again and again
-Speaker output at mid level is not audible and is audible wen at high range.
-Dont even take out headphones ....they are not worth touching
-No nfc
-it looks they have made phone in hurry and forgot to add good things because launch date was close
- at least it could have been bundled up with a good set of earphones..its 17000 for gods sake.
-display is not samsung type for which we buy samsung phones...now they will launch on max 2 with sAMOLED and NFC soon bec that lacked in this product.
-low light photography is a stunt and gives no better pics than a normal old smartphone....but yes pics are sharp.
Overall an appealing phone but a price of 14k suits it better.... READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
Guys,
Phone is fabulous. I got it yesterday @14,900 with SC 2K discount. Worth It.
Still I prefer to tell the major cons first:
1. Pathetic earpiece, ordinary as chinese mobile. Earlier Samsung use to give better earbuds but now they are doing cost cutting.
2. Very small and inferior quality charging cable.
3. Phone is not slim as well. Even, I afraid that on having back cover this will look more bulky.
4. Front camera selfies are gud but not of 13MP quality.
5. Phone mirroring and casting feature not provided.
6. Battery stays last long for 12 hours max on normal usage.
7. Installed Nougat 7.0 operating system has lot of bugs. So, sometimes your gmail contacts will be merged/swapped with each other in case u use more than one gmail account in the phone. I have faced this issue initially, which got rectified after lot of R&D.
Prons :
1. Sharp HD display.
2. S-clean is a good feature introduced in this phone that helps deleting all junk files. So need not to install Clean master app.
3. Finger print sensor and face recognition feature too gud to use.
5. Cloning and multi screen are also good features wherein you can have 02 watsapp and can equally operate 02 apps at a time.
6. Big 4GB RAM is more than enough to withhold the gaming thrust.
7. Over all phone rating 9/10 being stylish which completes all basic requirement one expect to be in a smartphone and worth buying in this price range. READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
review title: OK type device. Superb battery. SAD Front cam
content:
Pros:
Samsung Battery optimisation is awesome.. runs more than a day on full charge..
Touch is responsive. Faster processor.
Doesn't heat up compared to other Redmi/Moto phones.
Cons:
.. Finger print works great.. BUT if you install separate app for locking the screen, finger print won't work for ADDITIONAL SECURITY... I don't know why Samsung doesn't have an option to remove this additional security.
.. IF opting for this phone just for FRONT FLASH.. DONT... Samsung's 13MP front cam is worse than 8MP Redmi Camera..
Back Camera is good.. but I think I got the defective product, as the back camera seems flickering... I opted for replacement!! Will comment about back camera later!

MOTO G5 Plus is also a great device in this price range.. READ MORE

CONS-

2) Battery could be 4000 but that's not an issue as it runs all day after full charge.

Over all Nice phone if you are planning to buy a phone under 18K just go for it. You will not regret. READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
This phone was an emergency buy for me as my moto G5 currently screwed up.

Coming to On Max :
Pricing : 7/10

Camera is amazing. Best selfies and best low light pictures.
Day light pictures has good attention to details.

Performance is smooth and nice. Occassion lags while gaming.
Multi tasking between apps is effortless.

Processor is good. I am aware many people have their concerns over going with MediaTek processor as Snapdragon is the talk of the market.
But I can assure you MediaTek is doing a great job with this phone.
You will have a smooth and rapid experience.
It comes with 4 GB of ram which gives you a great performance.
Storage at 32 GB is good enough with expandable via memory card up to 256GB.


Screen size, if you are worried about?
It's 5.7, yes. But trust me it is not a concern.
When reading specifications it does come as a big phone.
But when you hold it in your hand; it fits in great.
I used to have Moto g5 (5 inch) and I have upgraded to 5.7' and it's a good upgrade I would say.

Design:

Phone is light weight for its size with a metal finish at the back.
A back case is highly recommended.

A drawback majorly is that it doesn't come with a gorilla glass protection. For 17k; that should be there by default.


Battery :

It comes in with a 3300 mah battery which you will see in almost all Samsung phones which is said to be good.
However, battery has been compromised here to give better performance and hence I would say that is has an average battery life.
Two hours of heavy usage over 4g internet can and will take up to 20% of your battery.
If I am paying 17k for a phone; I would expect battery to be good.
It's average here.

The good part is that Samsung gives you various battery saving options which is superb for extended battery life.


Overall, it's a good purchase I will say.
Nougat 7.0 out of the box is one of the major factors into buying this.

Battety could have better slightly.

In short :

Design : 8/10
Performance : 9/10
Camera : 9/10
Battery : 6.5/10 (because I paid 17k; else 7/10)
Sound : 7.5/10 READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
Samsung Galaxy On Max is a good phone compared with Samsung Galaxy J7 Max and other competitors in all aspects.

Pros:
1. 4GB RAM, 32GB ROM,
2. Dual Octa core Processor
3. Decent battery backup (3300 mah)
4. Good camera
5. Big Screen (5.7inch Display)
6. Multi Window Support
7. Build quality is good
8. Sound quality is good

Cons:
1. No LED notification lights for calls/sms
2. No LED light for charging
3. No backlit LED for Home/Menu/Back buttons
4. No AMOLED display (FHD)
5. No Corning Gorilla Glass Protection
6. Normal Flash light (Single LED) for Camera
7. Support Indian SIM Cards only. READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
Ordered in the night immediately after the phone was launched and got the phone in the evening today from a friendly smiling ekart wish master

So far:
Got the phone neatly packed in a Flipkart cover marked "Fragile, handle with care". Unboxing was neat and easy.

Comes with standard set of accessories - ear phones, usb cable and a charger.

Phone seems to be huge especially after using Moto G 1st gen for 3+ years.

First time launch and phone setup took a while since I had to restore my account from older phone to new one. We can setup Google account (which is standard in all Android phones) and also Samsung account.

UI is refreshingly smooth after using slower Moto G. It is also clean. Fingerprint unlock is quick and instantaneous. I had used Samsung Galaxy S III in the past and I'd not liked the TouchWiz UI. But the new UI is cooler with cleaner icons.

I shot few pictures and they all look good in the phone. But camera seems to be little slower. Need to shoot more photos to understand camera capabilities.

The performance is yet to be measured. Will update more info on a few days. READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
hi guys here I am sharing my experience..
1.LOOKING (5/5): really awesome and good product. looking & mobile style really nice.
2.HANGING(5/5): no hanging problems... as it is 4GB RAM.
3. CAMERA(3.8/5): Disappointed about camera. I expected nice clarity as they mentioned front 13MP and rear 13MP. but with respect to selfie RED MI NOTE4 (5MP) looking better than Samsung galaxy on max(13 MP) I don't know the what is the reason.
4.DISPLAY(4.5/5): as it is FHD display looking really awesome.
5. STORAGE(4.5/5): they provide only 32 GB... really disappointed better to keep 64 GB ( bcz 10k range mobiles also providing 64 GB ROM)
6.SOUND(5/5): audio and video sound is really good.
7. DELIVERY(5/5): delivered on time happy but the period from booking and delivery is too long . for me it has taken 6 days for Hyderabad location
8. (5/5)FRONT FLASH & BACK FLASH.. NICE IDEA
9. (5/5) 5.7 INCH display looking awesome.
10. (3/5)there is no back side sensor to take selfies (as lenovo mobiles have). READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
Using the phone for few hours after delivery. I should say, It is an elegant product. Nothing is bad. Speed is superb .Camera clarity is exellent. Sound is superb. Ear piece is standard. Compared Camera clarity with redmi note 4. My phone clarity is more special. No heat issues on usin sice last 5 hrs. . On charging it may have took 1 hr from 49% to 100%. Battery now at 65% using internet and apps for more than 3 hrs. Soft body.4gb RAM is great to use. I have observed the comments earlier and I was eager to check all that. I found no such troubles.Liked the phone very much.
With regards
Dr Jayaram Krishna READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
WRITING THIS REVIEW AFTER USING THE DEVICE FOR 2 DAYS THOROUGHLY....
Pros:
1. Display is superb, crisp and sharp. The curved glass also gives a very good display to the device.
2. Build quality is nice and fully metal, the device feels premium in hands.
3. Camera is very good for a budget device, forget about those chinese craps ( oppo and vivo)
4. Dedicated sd card slot.
5. Samsung new ui samsung experience version 8.1 will blow you away.
CONS:
1. Samsung should provide at least a tempered glass for such a high budget phone.
2. READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
The Product is totally good !

Flipkart taken three days to delivered the product, Over the performance of the Samsung Galaxy on max is good.

The phone has lots of features like Finger print Scanner in front side/Face detection log in/4GB Ram/32GB Inbuilt/Along wind Android 7.0

The TFT Screen look likes amoled HD Screen, Even though this mobile is also FHD with TFT Screen.

I received following contents from Samsung - Handset/USB Cable/Power Adaptor/Normal Samsung Headset/Sim Ejection pin/User Manual

I purchased in flipkart in 2018 New year offer - with the purchase amount worth 13900/-

No heating issue i faced yet !

Also this phone has many inbuilt sensors, if you compare with samsung on nxt most of the sensors are absence in on nxt.

The display of the phone is good and big size - 5.7inch

The above review which i described above is after 3 days of use only.

Thanks for the patience to read the above review ! READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
review title: Product is very very nice but having issue with service
content: samsung galaxy on max is really good product though NFC & super AMOLED display is not present, all necessary sensors are given but now I should not trust or suggest on buying product from flipkart as per my experience while I received my product with good packing, good delivery but I got scratched product ..may be it is minor crack in front- above side on 2d curve & at back side it has spot made by black marker while device packing was fully sealed I checked sharply.. now I don't have words to say ..if it is cheating by flipkart or by samsung... and due to out of stock I bought another product j3 pro from samsung online shop on sale too with worry of 1st time shopping after reading review there but device is perfectly new ..and inside packing is original outside packing is very very good for delivery.. hence atleast I can not blame samsung for my On max if it was boxed with cleverness.. READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content: The color of the screen is very poor. Yellow color is really not acceptable. Camera quality is not good not expect from 13MP samsung camera. The images capurtured by this phone is looks like low quality brands camera phones. M frequently mobiles changing person and the first thing i checked in mobiles are the camera quality. Do not buy this phone if u r a photography lover. Selfie 13MP camera looks like micromax 8MP camera. The images comes from its front camera are really very noisy and blurred. Choose something diffrent from samaung please go for moto g5plus. I request to flipkart to change the phone as it seems some quality in my phone, but they refused it. Now m lodge a case in consumer court against flipkart and the seller. Lets c what will happen. READ MORE

name: Samsung Galaxy On Max (Black, 32 GB)
content:
This is a very good product from Samsung! After exchanging my old Samsung A5 duos for Rs. 8200 and I got this phone only Rs 7700.
Face recognition and fingerprint sensor are very much fast. Processor speed with 4GB RAM is good.
Selfie camera 13MP is awesome.
Best phone in this price segment.
Pros -
1. Camera quality is amazing, best compared to other phones in this price.
2. Performance is amazing, applications run like a beast.
3. Screen size is perfect not very big, I was worried at the time of order but its ok.
4. Full hd videos..
5. Different modes available to manage your battery life.
Cons:
1. Battery is 3300 mah only, only a day not more than that.
2. Normal charging, no fast charging option.
3. Only 32 gb inbuilt memory, 64 gb option should also be provided. READ MORE
